document_data.name: Shandeir
document_data.mainbody:
'''Shandeir''' was a [[wizard]] and adventurer based in [[Elturel]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]] and considered one of the more important personalities of the city. Her long life extended well over a century, into the late 15{{th}} century, during which she was regarded as a wise and knowledgeable [[sage]].

{{Quote|Shandier was one of the greatest wizards alive. There are secrets in [[Tome of Zariel|this book long]] forgotten, and still, she was no match for [[Hoondarrh]].|[[Helene]], speaking to her [[Asmodeus|patron]].{{Cite comic/A Darkened Wish 4|2}}}}
document_data.Description: She was spirited and known to have a sharp tongue and salty humor. She was notorious for her pranks and riding a friendly [[copper dragon]] to travel from place to place.
document_data.Possessions: Later in life, Shandeir briefly came into possession of the ''[[Tome of Zariel]]''.
